name: Fan Dungeon: A Day in the Life of Team Tomorrow!
name_original: Fan Dungeon: A Day in the Life of Team Tomorrow!
description:
Fan Dungeon: A Day in the Life of Team Tomorrow!

For convenience, play the browser version above - for a smoother experience, play the downloadable version listed below.

Fan Dungeon is a fangame concept mixing elements of fanfiction and original ideas in a visual novel format. It celebrates the best parts of Pokémon Mystery Dungeon while presenting a unique narrative. It is also currently being developed as a hobby project!

Join Tate, Cinna, and Alya on an average day for an Exploration Team in Cherry Woods. Get to know these three in this bite-sized half hour short story!

A Furries Making Games Production

Coding and Writing by Ramble

Character Art by KaijuKid

Custom UI by Nyanhou

Original Music by Bauerklos Music and TGH

Special thanks to Tom, Morganw, Rob Colton, and Remix. Much love to Camy and Melty!

Discord: https://discord.gg/rWwshnr

Support Us: https://ko-fi.com/furriesmakinggames
